items.prompt: The expansion into the European market was profitable, ________ slow at the beginning.
items.explanation: 'Albeit' is used before an adjective or phrase to mean 'although'.

items.prompt: ________ we appreciate your offer, we have decided to stick with our current supplier.

items.text: The shipment was delayed [notwithstanding] our best efforts to expedite it.
items.explanation: 'Notwithstanding' is a formal way to say 'despite'.

items.text: An [Incoterm] defines where the risk transfers from the seller to the buyer.

items.prompt: Exercise 66: Vocabulary. 'Lead time' is the period between ________ and ________.
